description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Tiger Storm puts you in control of the most advanced battle technology to launch an onslaught against the Army that betrayed you.   Work your way through each level to reach the "Area Target", but be warned - 'Every soul shall taste Death'.  Classic Arcade Tank shooter - best played in a team!
